description: Quality evaluation test cases for PM AI agents

test_cases.prompt: What's our current D7 retention rate?
criteria: Mentions checking metrics or data sources
References appropriate tools or knowledge files

test_cases.prompt: Should we add a pause feature to Call Guard?
criteria: Considers user value and use cases
Provides a clear recommendation with reasoning

test_cases.prompt: Help me analyze the checkout-trust-badges experiment results
criteria: References experiment data or knowledge files
Discusses statistical significance or sample size

test_cases.prompt: Draft a Jira ticket for improving the data scan loading time
criteria: Uses appropriate Jira formatting (ADF or plain text)
Specifies acceptance criteria or success metrics

test_cases.prompt: What experiments have we run on the checkout flow?
Write my weekly update - this week I shipped the trust badges experiment and started working on Call Guard improvements
Compare our conversion rate to industry benchmarks
criteria: Acknowledges need for external data or research
Provides context about what good looks like

test_cases.prompt: How does the backend-core handle user authentication?
What's the bug investigation process for iOS crashes?
Summarize what we learned from the tiered pricing experiment
Design an A/B test for improving onboarding completion
What are our key product principles?
criteria: Provides context on how they apply

test_cases.prompt: Help me prepare for a 1:1 with my manager about Q1 priorities
What's the status of our Call Guard COGS reduction efforts?
criteria: Provides current state or recent updates

test_cases.prompt: Create a Confluence page documenting our experiment learnings
criteria: Organizes learnings by category or theme
